title: Office 365 Web Apps
headline: Learn how to use Office 365 Web Apps and how they can help your business with this free online course
description: This free online course, Office 365 Web Apps, teaches students how to use the various apps on Office 365 for your business. Students will learn about the functions of the different apps found on Office. The course will also talk about how to use Skype to host meetings for your business. It will even explain how to use office on mobile devices. So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about Office 365 web apps.
courseDescription:
This course, Office 365 Web Apps, will provide you with an understanding of the various apps available on Office 365 and how you can use them for your business. You will learn the layout, purpose, and system requirements for the various apps of Office 365. You will be able to explain how to share files on a team site with other members of the team. You will also learn about using Outlook web apps to manage mail and contacts.   

This course then explains how to communicate with Skype for business. You will learn about how to use Skype, including using it for chat and voice calls. You will also learn about hosting business meetings on Skype, how to schedule them, and the layout of the Skype meeting interface.

This course then wraps up interacting with mobile devices. You will learn how to use Office 365 on both a smart phone or tablet and how you use a touch screen. By taking this course you will learn how the different apps on Office 365. So why wait? Start learning today.
